text:
[Verse]
Feet on the pavement
Splashing in puddles
Feeling the raindrops
Breaking all troubles

[Verse 2]
Clouds in the sky
But I don't mind
Chasing my dreams
Leave fear behind

[Chorus]
Running through the rain
No slowing down
Laughing with the thunder
Dancing on the ground

[Verse 3]
Wind in my hair
Freedom's sweet sound
Heart's beating fast
All worries drowned

[Bridge]
Dream big
Run wild
Feel alive
Just smile

[Verse 4]
Sky opens wide
Raindrops keep falling
Joy's what I’m calling
No longer hiding
title: Running Through Rain
